definitions.text: a thin tissue or blood sample spread on a glass slide and stained for cytologic examination and diagnosis under a microscope

examples: he had a smudge on his cheek

definitions.text: an act that brings discredit to the person who does it
examples: he made a huge blot on his copybook

definitions.text: stain by smearing or daubing with a dirty substance
make a smudge on; soil by smudging
cover (a surface) by smearing (a substance) over it
charge falsely or with malicious intent; attack the good name and reputation of someone
examples: The article in the paper sullied my reputation
